oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-02-22 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 22, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performers Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 959th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl; Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper; Del Wood; Ernest Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ernest Tubb introduces Chet Atkins -- Dill Pickle Rag (Chet Atkins) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ernest Tubb introduces Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper -- The Tramp On The Street (Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Del Wood -- Whirl-A-Way (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner introduces Ernest Tubb -- My Treasure (Ernest Tubb) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ernest Tubb) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
